Package camzup.core

Class PngParser.Chunk

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.PngParser.Chunk
Direct Known Subclasses:
PngParser.IDATChunk, PngParser.IHDRChunk, PngParser.PHYSChunk
Enclosing class:
PngParser
public static class PngParser.Chunk
extends java.lang.Object
Defines a chunk of portable network graphics (.png) information. Contains a type description, a measure of the length of data in the chunk, the data, and a cyclic redundancy check (CRC). The CRC is not expected to be important.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Chunk​(byte[] length, byte[] type, byte[] data, byte[] crc)
    Constructs a chunk from four byte arrays.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String dataToArrString()
    Returns a string of the chunk's data as an array of bytes promoted to integers.
    java.lang.String dataToString()
    Returns a string of the chunk's data promoted from bytes to characters.
    int length()
    Returns the length of the data portion of the chunk as an integer.
    java.lang.String toString()
    Returns a string representation of this chunk.
    java.lang.String typeToArrString()
    Returns a the chunk's type arranged as an array of bytes promoted to integers.
    java.lang.String typeToString()
    Returns the chunk's type promoted from bytes to characters and concatenated into a String.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Chunk

      public Chunk​(byte[] length, byte[] type, byte[] data, byte[] crc)
      Constructs a chunk from four byte arrays.
      Parameters:
      length - the length array
      type - the type array
      data - the data array
      crc - the CRC array

  • Method Details

    • dataToArrString

      public java.lang.String dataToArrString()
      Returns a string of the chunk's data as an array of bytes promoted to integers. The array is enclosed by the tokens '[' and ']', and each element is separated with ','.
      Returns:
      the string

    • dataToString

      public java.lang.String dataToString()
      Returns a string of the chunk's data promoted from bytes to characters. This data is not expected to be human readable. Instead, it is useful to compare the parser's output with that of a hex editing tool.
      Returns:
      the string

    • length

      public int length()
      Returns the length of the data portion of the chunk as an integer.
      Returns:
      the length

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this chunk.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • typeToArrString

      public java.lang.String typeToArrString()
      Returns a the chunk's type arranged as an array of bytes promoted to integers. The array is enclosed by the tokens '[' and ']', and each element is separated with ','.
      Returns:
      the string

    • typeToString

      public java.lang.String typeToString()
      Returns the chunk's type promoted from bytes to characters and concatenated into a String.
      Returns:
      the string
